{{also|ander|Ander|änder|ånder|ænder|-ander}} ==Old English== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|ang|gem-pro|*anþeraz||other, back, in return}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|ang|/ˈɑnder/}} ===Prefix=== {{head|ang|prefix}} # Denoting reversal or something done in return. #: {{m|ang|andergilde|'''ander'''ġilde|compensation}}
